name: BTR-60
description: Soviet-made wheeled armored personnel carrier that can carry up to 14 soldiers.

name: BTR-70
description: Soviet-made wheeled armored personnel carrier that can carry up to 9 soldiers and has improved armor protection compared to the BTR-60.

name: BTR-80
description: Soviet-made wheeled armored personnel carrier that can carry up to 10 soldiers and has better cross-country mobility than the BTR-70.

name: BMD-1
description: Soviet-made airborne infantry fighting vehicle that can transport up to 5 soldiers and is equipped with a 73mm gun and a 7.62mm machine gun.

name: BMD-2
description: Soviet-made airborne infantry fighting vehicle that can transport up to 5 soldiers and is equipped with a 30mm cannon and a 7.62mm machine gun.

name: BMD-3
description: Russian-made airborne infantry fighting vehicle that can transport up to 5 soldiers and is equipped with a 30mm cannon, a 100mm gun and a 7.62mm machine gun.

name: Kurganets-25
description: Russian-made tracked armored personnel carrier that can carry up to 14 soldiers and is equipped with a remote-controlled 12.7mm machine gun.

name: Boomerang
description: Russian-made wheeled armored personnel carrier that can carry up to 11 soldiers and is equipped with a 30mm cannon and a 7.62mm machine gun.
